department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Supply and installation of racking materials
description: The Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide for the supply and installation of racking materials.
full_summary:
================================

### EB1444-232162 Industrial Racking Tender for DFO CCG Warehouse

#### Tender Details

*   **Tender ID Number:** EB1444-232162
*   **Solicitation Number:** WS4108795148
*   **Publication Date:** August 31, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** September 27, 2023 at 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)

#### Project Overview

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is soliciting offers from Suppliers to provide and install racking materials at the new Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) Warehouse located at 461 Higney Avenue, Burnside, Dartmouth, Nova Scotia, on behalf of Fisheries and Oceans Canada.

#### Tender Method

*   **Competitive Tendering**: The procurement process will be conducted on a competitive basis with open bidding.
*   **Evaluation Criteria**: The lowest price will be the primary evaluation criterion.

#### Trade Agreements

This tender is open to suppliers who are eligible under the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA).

#### Requirements

The successful bidder will be responsible for providing and installing industrial racking materials at the CCG Warehouse. The project scope includes supply and installation of racking materials at the specified location.

#### Important Dates

*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** TBA
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** October 31, 2023

#### Contact Information

For more information about this tender, please visit the procurement website at <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17311199>. Contact Brian Secord with any questions.
